about_the_game:
Experience Open World Game: the Open World Game in a way that will truly make all of your friends jealous.

With the purchase of the OWGTOWG - Special Edition you will receive:

One (1) Golden Glow Skin Mod

That's it. That's all you get.

Jokes aside, this is only here to give you a place to support our free game (which we are extremely grateful for your consideration).

If you're interested in supporting the game in any amount you can also tip via itchio here:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Graphics: SSE2 instruction set support.
